original_text: I tried very much to become wise. I wanted to understand the things that people do on the earth. People work in the day and in the night and they do not sleep.
korean_text: 내가 마음을 다하여 지혜를 알고자 하며 세상에서 행해지는 일을 보았는데 밤낮으로 자지 못하는 자도 있도다

sentences.original_text: I tried very much to become wise
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 지혜롭게 되기 위해 매우 노력했다

sentences.original_text: I wanted to understand the things
that people do on the earth
